title: Zombie Boyfriend
description:
by Tristin__Fiction

After the world goes to shit, Deku and Bakugo are forced to keep moving. But when things get a little…odd, Deku isn’t too sure what to do about it.

Words: 2109, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: Explicit
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings, Graphic Depictions Of Violence
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Bakugou Katsuki, Midoriya Izuku
  • Relationships: Bakugou Katsuki/Midoriya Izuku
  • Additional Tags: Zombie Apocalypse, Gay, Smut, NSFW, LEWD, Necrophilia, bnha - Freeform, mha - Freeform

summary: A spicy matchup. I'm a lesbian. I love playing overwatch and drawing video games and drawing. I'm a cancer. I'm very shy and...
question: A spicy matchup. I'm a lesbian. I love playing overwatch and drawing video games and drawing. I'm a cancer. I'm very shy and have trust issues when meeting people. I dont like to talk much I'd rather listen to someone speak. I have 1 dog, 2 gueina pigs, and 5 cats. I'm kinda short around 5'1. And I'm a picky eater.
answer:
I ship you with Kyoka Jirou! 

Jirou is the type of girls that can seem a bit unapprochable at first, but if she gets to know you she is actually a joy to be around. She definitely noticed you among the crowd, for the very simple reason that you seemed kind of alike, yet at the same time you were not the same. 

Jirou is really interested in music, as it is of relevance to her quirk, so I think she would appreciate the other arts as well. So when she saw you drawing away on your textbook on a lunch break she decided to approach you, slowly and all the while making sure not to see your artwork so as not to offend you or fluster you.

At first your whole “not really talking” personality would cause a bit of a misfunction in your friendship, as she doesn’t talk that much either. However, she made sure to stick to interesting for you topics, like your love for animals, your favourite food, hobbies and overwatch addiction.

As far as the latter is concerned, I think she would fall in love with you, if she had not already done so, when you both played overwatch. It is a time she holds dear in her heart as she saw a bold side of you she had never seen before.

When she accidentally found out of your sexual preferences she was beyond joyful; she would have been okay just with being your friend, however now she felt like she actually stood a chance to be with you. Not being the overly bold type she didn’t confess her feelings for you, but was focused on showing you her interest in you in subtle ways.

The thing is that the whole “subtle” thing flew out of the window when Denki accidentally revealed it to you. Her eyes bulged out of her head, too shocked and scared to even hit Denki in the face.

However, when you took her hand in yours and laced your fingers together, she knew she had no reason to be afraid and that, despite not saying that you like her back, you reciprocated her affections.

summary: I did a little portrait of Aoyama and it’s the best thing I did. I love this sparkly boy.  He even has sparkles on his cheeks...
body:
I did a little portrait of Aoyama and it’s the best thing I did. I love this sparkly boy. 

He even has sparkles on his cheeks and neck! What a perfect sparkly boy!

Please, do not repost on any other media, thanks!

blog.name: dabiisaromantic
blog.title: Another person with a dabi profile picture
blog.description: Hello, my name's Alex, I'm aromantic and my pronouns are they/them or he/him, welcome to my bnha sideblog! Don't be afraid to send asks or message me, I don't bite

title: Social media in bnha
body:
What does social media in bnha look like? Are there blogs about quirkless people-appreciation, or people calling out discrimination against mutated people? Is cancel culture still there, and does it also apply to heroes? Do younger heroes have tumblrs?? Are there vigilantes posting about the stuff they’re doing? ARE THERE VILLAINS WITH BLOGS?
This stuff is really interesting for me

summary: ok but what about characters AS pokemon
question: ok but what about characters AS pokemon
answer:
NOW THIS I CAN DO.

Also if you wanna see some awesome pokemon bnha designs hit up @kimboltart​ if you haven’t seen those yet!

Bakugou - Typhlosion, Quilava, Victini, or Blaziken. 
Kirishima - Lycanroc (any form), Larvitar, Rampardos, or Tyrantrum, Tyrunt
Midoriya - Pichu, Eevee, Cosmog or Phione
Shouto - Vulpix (Chimera), Litten, Braixen, or Victini
Iida - Manectric, Rapidash, Arcanine, or Deoxys
Momo - Smeargle, Ditto, or Porygon
Jirou - Noibat, Noivern, Riolu, or Lucario
Kaminari - Pichu
Sero - Levanny, Spinarak, Ariados, or Rotom
Ashido - Goomy, Sliggoo, Goodra, or Alolan Muk
Uraraka - Minior, Munna, or Jynx
Satou - Machoke, Machamp, Makuhita or Hariyama
Kouda - Deerling, Sawsbuck, Shaymin, or Zorua
Ojiro - Mankey, Aipom, Charmander, or Mienshao
Hagakure - Staryu, Starmie, Porygon, or Kecleon
Tsuyu - Politoed, Frogadier, or Greninja
Aoyama - Staryu, or Jirachi
Shouji - Octillery, Smeargle, Ditto, or Zoroark
Tokoyami - Murkrow, Liepard, Mimikyu, or Darkrai
Shinsou - Purrloin, Meowstic, Mewtwo, or Alolan Meowth

All Might - Solgaleo, Victini, or Entei
Aizawa - Meowstic, Alolan Persian, Ninetales, or Suicune
Mic - Chatot, Loudred, Exploud, or Meloetta
Midnight - Salazzle
Cementoss - Steelix
Recovery Girl - Mega-Audino
Nezu - Pikachu
Ectoplasm - Gengar
Lunch-Rush - Munchlax, Snorlax, or Dragonite
Thirteen - Cosmoem or Eglyem
Hound Dog - Lycanroc or Arcanine
Snipe - Remoraid
Powerloader - Sandslash
Vlad - Gliscor

Mirio - Dragonite or Garchomp
Tamaki - Mimikyu or Decidueye
Nejire - Altaria
Mei - Smeargle, Porygon, or Jigglypuff
Monoma - Ditto, Zorua, Zoroark, Bonsly, or Smeargle
Kendou - Hariyama, Mawile, or Happiny
Tetsutetsu - Same as Kirishima

Hawks - Talonflame, Ho-oh, Honchkrow, or Braviary
Miruko - Umbreon, Lopunny, or Bunnelby
Nana - Zygarde or Xerneas
Nighteye - Xatu
Gran Torino - Crobat
Fatgum - Snorlax
Endvore - Emboar

Tensei - Manectric, Rapidash, Arcanine, or Deoxys
Inko - Blissey or Chansey
Fuyumi - Alolan Vulpix, Amaura, Glaceon or Dewgong
Rei - Alolan Ninetales, Aurorus, Dewgong, Glaceon or Froslass
Natsuo - Glalie, Alolan Sandslash, or Glaceon

Shigaraki - Cubone
Mr. Compress - Hoopa
Dabi - Houndoom, Magmar, or Torracat
Toga - Gligar
Twice - Pyukumuku
Kurogiri - Gastly
Magne - Magneton
Chisaki - Yveltal or Honchkrow
Stain - Garchomp or Scyther
Moonfish - Bruxish
Gentle - Magikarp
La Brava - Smoochum
Muscular - Machamp
Mustard - Clawitzer
AFO - Mewtwo
OFA - Mew

Eri - Jirachi or Baby Arceus

If you don’t see them listed here then I haven’t given them much thought or I forgot about them!

tags: this has probably been said before but i feel like it must be said again
summary:
Idiot, complete fool: Bakugo only cares about Kirishima and merely tolerates the rest of the bakusquad
Me, a genius: Bakugo has...
body:
Idiot, complete fool: Bakugo only cares about Kirishima and merely tolerates the rest of the bakusquad

Me, a genius: Bakugo has different, but equally special relationships with each member of the bakusquad, yet is still bad at expressing it publicly because of his horrid social skills
